g.text: do we need to make notification setup stateful?
Sends saved timezone (based on the country) & asks whether it is correct:
omitted for clarity assuming that the notification setup aborts.
Shows buttons with all possible timezone (UTC-based) &
Sends message with the current time & shows buttons with time
Updates timepoint of user's recurring chat notification.
Schedules notification according to time parameters,
and sends a recurring Job for the notification.
is set up and will fire in N mins/hours,
reminds that the notification settings can be changed by running
Follow the same steps as above: 1) ask for timezone; 2) request timepoint;
3) Acknowledge that the notification is set.
